homepage.label: Matrix homeserver URL
homepage.description: Enter the address below into your Matrix-client as the homeserver.

onboarding.completionDesc: You're all set and ready to operate at full capacity.
onboarding.progressSaved: Your onboarding progress has been saved.

desktop-intro.title: Welcome to Matrix
desktop-intro.description: This onboarding uses the Element-client, but you can use almost any Matrix Client. The steps you need to take should be somewhat similar in other clients.

setup.title: Prerequisites
setup.description: Copy the homeserver address (1). You can return to the guide always from the bottom right corner.(2)

desktop-step-3.title: Log into Element - 3
desktop-step-3.description: Paste the server address you copied earlier. Press "Continue".

desktop-step-4.title: Log into Element - 4
desktop-step-4.description: Press "Continue with Keycloak". Continue in your browser, which should ask your for your mTLS-certificate. Authenticate with mTLS.

desktop-step-5.title: Element Homepage
desktop-step-5.description: You are now logged in and able to use Matrix. You can see or create spaces on the left (1). You can see and create your direct messages near the middle (2).

mobile-intro.title: Welcome to Matrix
mobile-intro.description: This onboarding uses the Element Classic-client, but you can use almost any Matrix Client. The steps you need to take should be somewhat similar in other clients.

mobile-step-3.title: Log into Element Classic - 3
mobile-step-3.description: Paste the server address you copied earlier. Press "Next".

mobile-step-4.title: Log into Element Classic - 4
mobile-step-4.description: Press "Continue with Keycloak". Continue in your browser, which should ask your for your mTLS-certificate. Authenticate with mTLS.

mobile-step-5.title: Element Classic Homepage
mobile-step-5.description: You are now logged in and able to use Matrix. You search users and rooms at the top right corner (1). You can start a chat from the bottom right corner (2).

onboarding.title: Onboard to Matrix
